author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA EXPECTED TO CROSS THE INTERNATIONAL DATELINE IN THE NEXT 12 HOURS OR SO...
summary: ...IONA EXPECTED TO CROSS THE INTERNATIONAL DATELINE IN THE NEXT 12 HOURS OR SO... As of 11:00 AM HST Fri Aug 01 the center of Iona was located near 15.0, -177.6 with movement WNW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA EXPECTED TO CROSS THE INTERNATIONAL DATELINE IN THE NEXT 12 HOURS OR SO... As of 11:00 AM HST Fri Aug 01 the center of Iona was located near 15.0, -177.6 with movement WNW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Iona (CP1/CP012025)
